item.description:
I have two t times for this Saturday at The Meadows in Peabody. Green fees are $43 plus $15 for cart. This course was really nice when I played it a few years back and I keep hearing good things about it. If the trees have changed we should have some good views too as its on the hilly side.

If you're interested, please rsvp as soon as possible as I have to give them a definite count by tomorrow at 3pm so they can sell the spots if we're not using them.

Hope to see you there,
Cindi 339-224-1377
item.how_to_find_us: around the club house 15 minutes to T time

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: The Meadows at Peabody
